name: Bianca
text: It brings me immense joy to have had the privilege of working alongside Stefan! Throughout our time together, he exuded a remarkable understanding of both frontend and backend development, truly establishing himself as an invaluable asset to our team

name: Rares
text: Stefan is a very passionate and dedicated developer. He is always eager to learn new things and is always willing to help others. He is also a very good communicator and is able to explain complex concepts in a clear and concise way

name: Christina
text: Stefan is a fantastic developer! He's not just skilled , but also super helpful and full of great ideas that really made our project pop

name: Nathaniel
text: I love our new website. It turned out even better than we expected. The design really matches our style. Highly recommend it to anyone who wants to improve their online presence
